dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: you know, Yahoo Trends just dropped their Year in Search review, and uh, Joe Biden topped the list.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: you know, Yahoo Trends just dropped their Year in Search review, and uh, Joe Biden topped the list.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: President-elect Joe Biden is on his way to being sworn in as president next month, but in the meantime hes won another honor: topping this years Google Trends, according to the tech giants Year in Search review.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh yeah, that makes sense—especially with the election and everything. I think it said searches for him peaked the week after the election, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh yeah, that makes sense-especially with the election and everything. I think it said searches for him peaked the week after the election, right?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to Google Trends, searches for Biden reached a peak the week of Nov. 1 through Nov. 7, the week the presidential election took place and when the Associated Press called his Oval Office win the following weekend.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly, November 8th through the 14th. And then, uh, Putin was second? That's wild.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly, November eighth through the fourteenth. And then, uh, Putin was second? That's wild.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: After Biden, the most searched people were North Korean dictator Kim Jong Un particularly in April, when rumors he had died circulatedfollowed by Vice President-elect Kamala Harris.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, apparently in April when there were all those rumors he'd died or something? [laughs] The internet goes crazy.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, apparently in April when there were all those rumors he'd died or something? The internet goes crazy.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: After Biden, the most searched people were North Korean dictator Kim Jong Un particularly in April, when rumors he had died circulatedfollowed by Vice President-elect Kamala Harris.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And then Mike Pence after that. But what's interesting is Trump didn't even make Yahoo's top 10 this year.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And then Mike Pence after that. But what's interesting is Trump didn't even make Yahoo's top ten this year.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: After Biden, the most searched people were North Korean dictator Kim Jong Un particularly in April, when rumors he had died circulatedfollowed by Vice President-elect Kamala Harris.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Really? But he was the most Googled person globally, wasn't he?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Really? But he was the most Googled person globally, wasn't he?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: President Donald Trump didnt land in the top 10, though he was the most Googled person in the world in 2016, the year he was elected president.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, exactly! It's like, different platforms, different vibes. He was the most tweeted about person though.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, exactly! It's like, different platforms, different vibes. He was the most tweeted about person though.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: However, Trump did take the top spot this week for the most tweeted about person of the year, followed by Biden, while Harris was the most tweeted about woman on the platform.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Right, and Kamala Harris was second there. But Biden was actually the most tweeted about *woman* on Twitter? Wait, how does that work?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, and Kamala Harris was second there. But Biden was actually the most tweeted about woman on Twitter? Wait, how does that work?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: However, Trump did take the top spot this week for the most tweeted about person of the year, followed by Biden, while Harris was the most tweeted about woman on the platform.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: [chuckles] I think they meant Kamala was the most tweeted about woman, not Biden—that would be a twist.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: chuckles I think they meant Kamala was the most tweeted about woman, not Biden-that would be a twist.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: However, Trump did take the top spot this week for the most tweeted about person of the year, followed by Biden, while Harris was the most tweeted about woman on the platform.
